sentence: (CHEERING AND APPLAUSE) Geoff Bennett: A similar challenge to North Carolina Republican Madison Cawthorn was blocked by a federal judge last month.
author: Lisa Desjardins
title: GOP's McCarthy and Greene are confronted by their own words after Jan. 6

sentence: Two pictures of Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn (N.C.) shared with Politico show the embattled congressman at what appears to be a party in women's lingerie.
author: Lexi Lonas
title: Photos show Cawthorn wearing lingerie at apparent party: Politico

sentence: AD WARS Sen. THOM TILLIS isn't letting up in his opposition to fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. MADISON CAWTHORN: A Tillis-aligned super PAC is putting up $310,000 to air an ad attacking Cawthorn, per Axios' Lachlan Markay.
title: POLITICO Playbook PM: McCarthy gets a lifeline (and another leak)
